channel.title: If some1 has something on they cannot attack 1 another AND MORE!
channel.description:
well im trying to make a minigame that you cant attack some1 on yout team if they have a zammy cape on (cw 1) and u have it to. how would i make it so they CANT attack each other??
Next question: make it so if you die u dont lose items. (only in that area)
Last question: add a panel to the top right corner telling you who is leading.

item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Answer 1:
if(!playerEquipment[playerCape] == zammycape)
{
attackAndStuff();
}

answer 2:
if(!(absX >= #### && absX <= #### && absY >= #### && absY >= ####))
{
loseitems();
}
